website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel FujiTrabuco 4 is an extremely-muscled trail shoe that adheres to the standards of traditional trail shoes. Runners will not be disappointed by its arch support and stability despite being a neutral shoe. It is a very comfortable shoe that slogs through the poundings of an everyday run.
pros: Asics uses the new Mono-Sock Fit System in the FujiTrabuco 4 to enhance the shoe’s comfort and personalized fit
The outsole lugs in the Gel FujiTrabuco 4 are slightly larger and more aggressive than past models for improved traction on different trails and off-road surfaces
Some testers loved its numerous trail-protection features
It is a very comfortable shoe based on the observation of a large number of runners
The generous toe box of the Asics FujiTrabuco 4 is a significant part of its very comfortable ride
A good number of runners loved the way it supports the foot, particularly on uneven trail
A few runners liked the 4 different color options as they are stylishly done
cons: Few runners mentioned that the shoe feels heavy
It does not do very well on technical trail
All the comfort and stability compromised the shoe’s ground feedback

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, I ordered on Sunday and they were at my desk on Tuesday (forcing me to got off my arse and try them out!). Nice and comfortable and appear to have the grip required for trail running. I got a slight wobble on a muddier path, but I don't know that I could expect a high level of grip from a non-studded shoe. Overall really pleased at this price point. I'll be sure to edit in a few months after a chunk of use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best pair trainer
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair trainer I have ever had. I bought Nike Huarache before this one and it was very uncomfortable I had to return it back and buy this one .only because my wife bought it and she said it was amazing.honestly if you are looking to buy comfortable pair trainer this is the best one you can have and I mean the best one much better than Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Babylon

customer_reviews.title: Asics Gel-Fujitrabuco Trail Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These Trail Shoes fit really well, they are lightweight and well padded which ensures that my feet are well cushioned. So far, after 20+ miles, they seem ideal for the task. They were delivered quickly and the price was excellent. Good value and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Asics reliable fit but not for distance runs
customer_reviews.text: Asics fit me perfectly and these fujitrabuco are no exception, very comfortable on trail road and even treadmill, not as much support for a stability shoe as I'd like but ok if only used for short distance(10-20k) not to good for technical trails I use different shoes for this job(salomon) but for less than £60 this is a decent shoe
customer_reviews.author: mr r p hirst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trail runners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Beware that they have the support so if you need neutral they might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Henry mckneegrabber

customer_reviews.title: Bright and breezy
customer_reviews.text: I've only been running twice in these so far but they fit well and have settled in quickly. Grip feels good. They are very colourful!
customer_reviews.author: JohnT

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Still wearing these, had to give up running but still good for the gym. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Monster

customer_reviews.title: Nice trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: They felt good but the size came up slightly big for me. However still fine to run in. Felt like they had decent grip.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit and cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a spare pair for parkrun and fields. Fantastically comfortable straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: he's advised they are comfortable and he's happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for boxing training, he's advised they are comfortable and he's happy with them. They are exactly as they look on photo. Great value trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, so far have done it's job and kept me upright on muddyy courses
customer_reviews.author: D8RVG

customer_reviews.title: Put them on and they were like wearing a glove
customer_reviews.text: My first ever pair of Trail Shoes, but I've been wearing Asics running shoes for years now. Put them on and they were like wearing a glove. So comfy. Ran round the park in them and got them muddy, hardly slipped at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good choice
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mixed use running shoe. Having returned to running after a 15 year hiatus, this incomprehensibly named running shoe compares well to my old Asics GTs and Kyanos of old. Good weight distribution allows for some minor over-pronation, whilst the gell pack is already defending my geriatric knees from the 'shock & awe' of the first steps back to fitness I'm approximately 5'11" running in a UK9.5 and 203lbs overweight They've now done 30odd miles and felt very comfortable right out of the box Finally great delivery and service from the Amazon distributor.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: ... Asics running shoes over the years and these are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Had several pairs of Asics running shoes over the years and these are comfortable and fit well. I hope they do not prematurely wear through the toes like all other pairs have. I have given 4 stars as this seems to be an inherent fault which should be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, supportive and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as he gets on well with the asics trail shoes, and says they are very comfortable. I liked the colours, bright and stylish, my husband is a keen Roma supporter, so the colours were a hit.
customer_reviews.author: YVONNE

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Gel-Fujitrabuco 4
customer_reviews.text: great fit, sturdy support, should be good for quite a few gym sessions before wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyjohn68

customer_reviews.title: Great as always.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Excellent comfort straight away. Good grip on runs so far but looking forward to putting them through their paces at Tough Mudder. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Decent trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair of Fuji Trabuco tnet I've purchased.It's a decent and moderately priced "all rounder" .No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for all surfaces short and long distances, grip really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. And pretty prompt delivery even after change of address notification.
customer_reviews.author: sean simone

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-Fujitrabuco 4, Men's Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The upper part of the Asics Gel FujiTrabuco 4 trail shoe features breathable mesh, allowing the foot to stay cool and dry as you pick up the pace. A MONO-SOCK construction provides a slipper-like feel, allowing for a secure and comfortable fit. The ComforDry Sockliner offers additional cushioning to the foot, and thanks to the antibacterial fabric, it also helps reduce bacteria causing odour, so the foot stays fresh. The Anti Gravel Tongue is an added feature of the Gel FujiTrabuco 4 and helps to prevent debris such as stones and grit from entering, meaning you won't need to stop to empty the shoe. A Lace Pocket allows you to tuck away laces to reduce distraction and prevent any annoying loose ends, whilst 3M reflective elements come in handy for running during low light conditions. MIDSOLE The Asics Gel FujiTrabuco 4 consists of a Solyte Midsole, This is Asics extremely lightweight midsole, featuring less weight than Asics traditional EVA and SpEVA. It also provides excellent cushioning, comfort and durability. The shoe also features rearfoot and forefoot GEL cushioning, to attenuate shock during impact and toe-off phases and allows movement in multiple planes. OUTSOLE The GEL FujiTrabuco features a durable and aggressive outsole which welcomes rough and challenging terrain. It consists of AHAR+, a lighter version of AHAR, which is a tough material placed in critical areas of the shoe to provide excellent grip without compromising durability. Lugs in the medial and lateral sides offer better traction on different surfaces, preventing slippage during wet and muddy conditions. The forefoot of the shoe also has a Rock Protection Plate to protect the foot against sharp objects such as rocks and branches.
feature_bullets: ComforDry Sockliner - Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and anti-microbial properties for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
Clutch Counter - Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.
Anti Gravel Tongue - Special tongue construction that prevents debris entering the shoe, providing protection.
Lace Pocket - A pocket enabling the laces to be tucked in and unexposed.
3M Reflective - Reflective material produced by 3M company, for night safety.
